thread.title: Garry Taylor
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Garry Taylor

author: Garry Taylor
title: Garry Taylor
text:
We had not been looking at Solar Installation just yet, but after an unsolicited call from a solar company and a visit from their salesperson, we wanted further information and found Solar Quote: s on the internet.
WOW! what a great site with all the information needed to make a complex matter simply explained. Solar Quote: s referred us to three companies for Quote: s and we have now accepted one of these offers, and are looking forward to installation in the next few weeks. Thanks again Finn Peacock.
